title: I'm really starting to like Guard Lancing
body:
finally learning how to play lance fluidly

as a gunlance main, lance always felt incredibly stilted and just not as entertaining.

But now I can finally counter combo and use my attacks to get in the correct position. I guess, like every weapon, you just need to learn some of the combo quirks (like how you can go out of a block into a quick counter to go from blocking to attacking without wasting time dropping your shield)

still cannae wait for evade+3 brokenness and spamming total invulnerability backhops with evade lance.

where mah hunters at
